scripts.cdk:synth: npm run build && cdk synth --app app.js
scripts.cdk:diff: npm run build && cdk diff --app app.js
scripts.deploy:hosted-zones: npm run build && cdk deploy --app app.js --context environment=dev --context deploy-backend=false
scripts.deploy:hosted-zones:dev: npm run build && cdk deploy --app app.js Lingible-Dev-HostedZones --context environment=dev --context deploy-backend=false --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:hosted-zones:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy --app app.js Lingible-Prod-HostedZones --context environment=prod --context deploy-backend=false --require-approval any-change
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && cdk deploy --app app.js Lingible-Dev --context environment=dev --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy --app app.js Lingible-Prod --context environment=prod --require-approval any-change
scripts.clean: rm -rf cdk.out dist lambda-layer lambda-packages lambda-hashes.json && find . -name '*.js' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './scripts/*' -delete && find . -name '*.d.ts' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './scripts/*' -delete && find . -name '*.js.map' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './scripts/*' -delete && find . -name '*.tsbuildinfo' -delete
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.clean:python: find . -name '*.pyc' -delete && find . -name '__pycache__' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '.pytest_cache' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '.mypy_cache' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '.coverage' -delete && find . -name 'htmlcov' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:system: find . -name '.DS_Store' -delete && find . -name 'Thumbs.db' -delete && find . -name '*.log' -delete && find . -name '*.tmp' -delete && find . -name '*.swp' -delete && find . -name '*.swo' -delete
scripts.clean:build: find . -name 'build' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name 'dist' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '*.egg-info' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:workspace: npm run clean && npm run clean:python && npm run clean:system && npm run clean:build
